allow:
Bash(python3 -c "
import sys, json

# Read the first line (sections as JSON)
sections_json = sys.stdin.readline().strip()
sections = json.loads(sections_json)

# Read the rest (results as JSON)
results_json = sys.stdin.read().strip()
results = json.loads(results_json)

print(''''=== REQUESTED SECTIONS ==='''')
print(''''Sections:'''', sections)
print()

print(''''=== ACTUAL RESULTS SECTIONS ==='''')
print(''''Result keys:'''', list(results.keys()))
print()

print(''''=== HAS TECHNICAL DATA ==='''')
print(''''Has technical section:'''', ''''technical'''' in results)
")
